name: Teeter3D
description:
Teeter 3D is a game of skill in full 3D.

Agility, Dexterity, Reflex and Observer are your qualities.

You should move your ball from green base to red base.

Objects (Walls, Canons, Magnets...) progress dynamically and will cause difficulties in your moves.

You control the ball by incline your device.

A button allow your ball to jump over obstacles. Joystick move the camera, give you more accuracy to avoid collisions.

Teeter 3D spoil you with a lot of bonus, to consume without moderation.

Win points, modifiy moves, interact with environment..Teeter 3D will satisfy

A countdown show you the time remaining for each level. Each second is important, more quickly you reach red base more your score raise.

Teeter 3D suggest you to customize your interface

You can choose your ball, the ground and general game's look.

Progress through 50 levels and share your score.

A podium show your ranking among 100 best gamers over the world.
